ARIVU MCP - LLM QUICK SHEET (minimal, task-first)

Reddit (connector: "reddit")
Tasks -> Tools
- Subreddit feed (hot/new/top) -> reddit/list (requires subreddit)
- Keyword search -> reddit/search (requires query)
- Post + comments -> reddit/get (requires post_url)

Notes
- There is no global "top posts" tool; always specify a subreddit.
- Use reddit/list for subreddit feeds (hot/new/top), not reddit/search.
- post_url must be a full Reddit URL, not just a post ID.

Minimal JSON-RPC examples
1) Subreddit top posts (via list)
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"reddit/list","arguments":{"subreddit":"rust","sort":"top","time":"week","limit":10}},"id":1}

2) Keyword search
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"reddit/search","arguments":{"query":"rust async","subreddit":"programming","sort":"relevance","time":"all","limit":5}},"id":2}

3) Post + comments
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"reddit/get","arguments":{"post_url":"https://www.reddit.com/r/rust/comments/abc123/example_post","comment_limit":25,"comment_sort":"best"}},"id":3}
